divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: My husband myself and my children saw 5 sightings and 2 pesrsonal events upon ourselves, and on at a funeral in Marlboro, Mass. I experienced a type of awake-paralysis--teeth were clamped shut and I could not move. My daughter has had numerous accounts of this happening to her. She claims she also saw small white creatures surrounding her bed when that happened. That was in Nashua, NH here where we live now. One of the strange events happened with my parents and my motner-in-law as witness. A huge monster flash of light came in a side window near our house in the woods and streaked through the house-also in the 1980 s. I will write all of these cases down for proper documentation. Finally. PN
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Nashua
There were no other sightings in Nashua on or around March 1st 2005
